charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was on [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] way
home after exploring.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1101_0200_: Just then, a Pokémon caught [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] eye.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1201_0400_:
I didn’t expect to see a child walking around here
so late at night.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_0401_0600_:
You don’t need to explain yourself. It’s none of
my concern.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_0402_0800_:
You don’t need to explain yourself. It’s none of
my concern.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1201_0900_:
Walk around wherever you want at night,
but don’t get too close to Darkrai.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1201_1000_: If you do, you’ll have nightmares.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1201_1100_:
To protect itself, Darkrai afflicts those around it
with nightmares and chases them away.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1201_1200_:
It actually doesn’t cause these
nightmares intentionally.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1201_1300_:
The response is instinctive. Darkrai pushes others
away and lives a solitary life as a result.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_0402_1700_:
I don’t think there’s anyone but me who could be
Darkrai’s partner.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1201_1800_:
My spirit is not so weak that I would be terrified
by nightmares.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1201_1900_:
The world of darkness that Darkrai shows
me—devoid of joy or despair—doesn’t
feel like a nightmare at all.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1201_2000_: If anything, I feel at ease there.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1201_2100_:
But people and Pokémon are far too scared
of darkness.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1201_2200_:
There aren’t many who feel positively
about Darkrai.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_0401_2400_:
You don’t have to force yourself to say
something positive.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_0402_2600_: No, I don’t think it has such feelings.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_0402_2700_:
After spending so much time alone, Darkrai no
longer feels such things as sadness or loneliness.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1201_2800_:
If you sympathize with Darkrai and would like to
spend time with it...
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1201_2900_:
you have to be prepared to enter a world of
pure darkness.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1201_3000_:
If you can accept a world of nothingness, then
you can truly understand Darkrai’s spirit.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1201_3100_: That’s what it means to be together with Darkrai.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_0301_3200_: If that’s what it’ll take to be friends...
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_0401_3300_: So you’re not afraid of nightmares?
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_0401_3400_:
You’ve got the kind of spirit that lets you endure
fear if it’s for the sake of Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_0402_3600_: I’d say that’s a normal reaction.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_0402_3700_:
With an incomplete spirit, it would be very difficult
to endure a world of loneliness.
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1201_3800_:
If you really understand what it means to be near
Darkrai and its nightmares, and you want to get
to know it better...
charaepi_ch0194_10_akagi/2301_1201_4000_: I’ll show you a truly beautiful world.
